Collagen Peptide Manuka Honey Drink supports skin, joint, and bone health while boosting hydration and elasticity. Night Rejuvenating Manuka Honey is the world’s first honey designed to protect the liver with rejuvenating properties that provides detoxification while you sleep. Comvita™ 10+ 麦卢卡蜂蜜是来自新西兰的优质蜂蜜，因其抗菌特性而闻名。它有助于增强免疫力，缓解喉咙痛，并促进消化。胶原蛋白肽麦芦卡蜂蜜饮品有助于皮肤、关节和骨骼健康，同时改善皮肤水分和弹性。刺梨朝鲜蓟麦芦卡蜂蜜饮品是全球首款设计用于保护肝脏的蜂蜜，结合了麦卢卡蜂蜜的益处和修复特性，支持整体健康和帮助睡眠时排毒。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Ellixi Hair Revival Shampoo
programme.desc: A breakthrough 4-in-1 formula that colors, nourishes, volumizes, and strengthens hair—while improving scalp health in just 5 days. Powered by Korean patented polyphenol technology, it offers safe, natural grey coverage without harsh chemicals, leaving hair darker, fuller, and healthier with every wash. Ellixi发量黑洗发水，采用颠覆性的4合1配方：洗头同时染发、护发、增发量并强韧发丝，仅需5天即可改善头皮与发质。采用韩国专利多酚技术，无需染发剂或化学添加，温和自然遮盖白发。结合多酚氧化着色原理与草本养护成分，让秀发一洗更黑、更丰盈、更健康。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Kinohimitsu Detox
programme.desc: Feel light, clean, and energized with Kinohimitsu Detox, specially curated for TWS by experts— a trio of Bio-Booster, Detox Enzyme, and Footox. Boost nutrient absorption, ease digestion, and flush out toxins naturally. Ease the constipation and cleansing your body, easy for you to create a daily routine for total wellness. Kinohimitsu 轻盈排毒组专家专为TWS精心打造的轻盈排毒组，让您感觉轻盈、洁净、充满活力——它包含Bio-Booster、Detox Enzyme 和Footox 3项好评排毒保健品。有助于促进营养吸收，促进消化，并自然排出毒素。缓解便秘，净化身体，让您轻松建立维护全面健康的日常习惯。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Furi Knife Bundle Set
programme.desc: Slice, dice, and chop like a pro with our kitchen knives! 厨房刀片如同专业大厨一般娴熟！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Nature's Farm® Krill Oil 180s
programme.desc: Nature’s Farm Krill Oil is made with SUPERBA 2™ krill oil, one of the most researched krill oils, backed by over 130 clinical trials. It is pure, sustainable, and traceable from catch to capsule. Rich in omega-3s, astaxanthin, phospholipids, and choline, it supports heart, brain, liver, eye, skin, and joint health. Nature's Farm来自南极的磷虾油，富含优质Omega-3脂肪酸和虾红素, 有助于维持胆固醇水平、维护心 脏、大脑和关节健康！ 人体对磷虾油的吸收率更高，没有难闻的鱼腥味，软胶囊更容易吞服，一天2颗有助于维护整体健康！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Acerpure Water Purifier + Air Fryer
programme.desc: Upgrade your kitchen with the Acerpure Aqua WP5 Water Purifier and 2-in-1 Flip Air Fryer—the ultimate duo for convenience and health. Enjoy instant 99°C hot and 5°C cold water, perfectly filtered with 5-in-1 RO & double UV sterilization, while the 2-in-1 Flip Air Fryer lets you air fry, grill, or make soup with a quick 180° flip. Both are easy to use, safe, and efficient—smarter cooking and cleaner drinking water, all in one kitchen setup. 厨房必备组合：Acerpure Aqua WP5 滤净水器搭配2合1翻转气炸锅，理想组合，健康又方便。随时享用 99°C 热水 / 5°C 冷水，水质纯净安全（5合1 RO+双重UV杀菌）；翻转气炸锅可轻松实现 空气炸、烤肉、煮汤。操作简单、安全高效，干净饮水与轻松烹饪，一台搞定厨房大小事！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Nature’s Farm Pycnogenol

Supported by over 160 clinical trials and 450 scientific studies, it helps fight oxidative stress and promotes overall wellness—benefiting the brain, eyes, heart, joints, skin, and blood sugar balance for all ages. Its 3-part sole massage mechanism provides targeted relief, with three intensity levels and five massage modes for a customized experience. It also features a two-level heat function for the soles. OTO Footplus 按摩器提供 3D 足部按摩，并配有可拆卸的气囊压缩系统，适用于小腿、大腿、手臂和腹部，带来全身按摩体验。其三段式足底按摩机制提供针对性缓解，三种按摩强度和五种按摩模式可根据需求定制体验。此外，还配有两档足底加热功能。

Respect is shown by good treatment, complying with the laws to live in peace! We will also understand freedom and how to use it intelligently.

programme.title: Mellodees - Rock A Bye Baby - EP2
programme.desc: Dee dreams of a magical carpet ride in the clouds with his favorite teddy bear. Will you join them on this adventure?

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep1 - EP101
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Pesticide Pest - EP201
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team fight pollution in the Missouri River from pesticides from being dumped.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Flyaway / Safari Soulmates - EP212
programme.desc: The Praxtons use helium balloons to try and set a world record; in Africa, the symbiotic relationship between ostriches and zebras is threatened when Preston rounds up ostriches for his own profit.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Awesomemobile Deluxe / Follow Your Nose - EP113
programme.desc: After making some modifications to the kids’ new self-driving car, Kent takes the vehicle for a spin and loses it. / When J.D. and Kent accidentally beam their noses to parts unknown, they must find and reattach their fugitive snouts – somehow – while they still can.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - Down and Out In Beijing - EP107
programme.desc: In Beijing, a young Chinese teen, left in charge of his family grocery store over orders a perishable food item without properly planning and it results in financial ruin for his parent's store…or so his vivid imagination pictures

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Weirdo World - EP120
programme.desc: Mr. Arnold and the Super K's are teleported to an alternate world where everything is opposite!

programme.title: Shaq's Garage - Saving Klaus - EP108
programme.desc: Klaus is on loan to a local car museum, but the Shaq Paq gets the wrong idea and suits up for a clandestine rescue operation.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - Go With the Flow, Part 2 - EP2
programme.desc: The story takes place in the distant future and focuses on a boy named Yuma Tsukumo, the number one bad boy at his school. Something unexpected happens when Ryoga challenges him to a Duel as the mysterious ghost of Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep3 - EP3
programme.desc: Eight kid gamers, ages eight to twelve, battle it out in ten different Roblox games to win prizes and find out who is the ultimate gamer! Video gamer, football star, and children’s book author Rashad Jennings hosts!

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Baby Neptune: Discovering Water
programme.desc: Within a baby's first year of life, new experiences can transform what might otherwise seem to be ordinary events into exciting opportunities for imaginative play. Baby Neptune™ exposes little ones to the wonders of water in their world -- whether they're stomping in the rain, splashing in the bathtub, playing "catch me if you can" with the tide on the beach, or "meeting" the fascinating creatures that live in rivers, lakes and oceans.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Communication - EP116
programme.desc: In this episode, we will discover the value and importance of communication. We will learn the correct ways to communicate and the main rules of the good listener. We will know in which sites we can raise our voice and when we should respect the silence of others. We will talk about rumours and how harmful they are for effective communication.

programme.title: Mellodees - Itsy Bitsy Spider - EP3
programme.desc: With a rainstorm approaching, Dee has playtime in his room and makes a new little friend.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep2 - EP102
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Flammable Forest - EP202
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team fight Nick Slick from destroying tropical forests in Sumatra.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Spooky Costume Party / GMO OMG - EP213
programme.desc: The gang helps Patty with an eco-friendly spooky costume party; Preston's genetically modified crops are going crazy.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Fungal Bungle / Water Friends For? - EP114
programme.desc: Kent’s extreme attempts to cure his toe fungus in time for a pool party cause the fungus to mutate and grow into a fungus-based replica of Kent himself. The Secret Lab Kids have to stop the replicant before it turns the whole lab into a stinky, sticky fungus-farm. / When Kent manages to contact aliens, they land at the Edison complex and demand that the Secret Lab kids help them find a very valuable "treasure" that their planet needs. The trouble is, they don't know the earth word for this treasure - sending our kids scrambling to solve this mystery before they get turned into "shrablitz”!

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - Listen to the Music - EP108
programme.desc: A musical superstar's concerned call prompts Warren to send the SMC team in to save her opening act's promising career from a greedy, crooked Manager who is exploiting him and having him focus on everything but his core business and passion music

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Willie Parker has betrayed his former 'colleagues' and now lives in Spain, where he thinks he can hide from their vengeance. But one day, ten years later, two hitmen show up and he must face the music.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. programme.desc: Within a baby's first year of life, new experiences can transform what might otherwise seem to be ordinary events into exciting opportunities for imaginative play. programme.desc: Kent’s extreme attempts to cure his toe fungus in time for a pool party cause the fungus to mutate and grow into a fungus-based replica of Kent himself. programme.title: Kids' Planet - Dignity - EP117
programme.desc: In this episode we will discover the value of dignity, finding that it goes hand in hand with self-love and self-esteem. programme.desc: Hoping to get on a dance show, Von Bolt wears a remote-control dance outfit! programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sébastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: Open Door
programme.desc: Rudina embarks on a road trip with her pregnant sister Elma back to their Albanian hometown. However, Elma is unmarried, and they need to find someone to play the part of her husband in order not to anger their traditional father.

programme.title: Backwards
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. The story of a young mother of an autistic boy, whose many years of stubbornness and the fight against bureaucracy and human heartlessness led to changes in the education system.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: Murder in Haute Provence
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a body found in a slaughterhouse with the label “Can they suffer”. Although an animal rights association was initially suspected, details reveal that the victim was an undercover cop specialising in veterinary surveillance.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.
